篗字的基本解释

篗
yuè
络丝的用具：“累累茧满簇，绎绎丝上篗。”

篗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》王縛切，入藥，云。］
亦作“篗1”。
络丝、纱、线等的工具。

篗字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　篗； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页893第39
【廣韻】【集韻】?王縛切，音貜。收絲器也。【廣雅】榬謂之篗。【揚子·方言】篗，榬也。兗豫河濟之閒謂之榬。【郭註】所以絡絲者也。同籰。

考證：〔【揚子·方言】【註】所以終絲者也。〕　謹照原文終絲改絡絲。
篗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
篗字的起名意思

暂无。

篗
Basic explanation of words
篗
yuè
Wire-winding utensils: "A lot of cocoons are full of tufts, and the silk is unraveling."
篗
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guang Yun" Wang Fu cut, used in medicine, cloud. ]
Also known as "篗1".
Tools for winding silk, yarn, thread, etc.
篗
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　篗; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 893 39
[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Wang Fuqie, Yinfeng. The take-up device is also. [Guangya] What is called the 篗. [Yangtze Dialect] Gu, Li Ye. The leisure of Yanyu Heji is called 榬. [Guo's Note] That's why the winder is also. The same. Textual research: [[Yangtze Dialect] [Note] So the final silk is also. 〕　I would like to change the final silk to the winding silk according to the original text.
篗
